Following the road signs for the centre takes you round not particular attractive outskirts then somehow out the other side of town. Use your instincts and head up the hill to the centre.

value: directions=Take the B96. Take the Vieschstraße from the town center and then Rugardweg.
content=If you do not enjoy mountaineering, why not try climbing in the forest? Kletterwald Rügen has around 80 stations of various difficulty.
alt=Inselrodelbahn Bergen auf Rügen am Rugard
directions=Take the B96. Take the Vieschstrasse from the town center and then Rugardweg.
content=You do not need ice or snow to go rodeling. You can do it just as well during the summer on this over 700 m long track.

Real supermarket on the edge of town.
